TO: Mr. Dick Rider
FROM: James S, Miles
Mr. Harry Lamb
Mr. Art Weld
Mr. Lee Dreyfuss
Mr. H. B. McCarty
Mr. Walter Emery
Mr, Harold Hill
Director
Region III
February 23* 1959
Mr^ Harry Skornoa
<Kr& Bill Harley
Mr. Larry Frymire
Mr. Irving Merrill
Mr. Armand Hunter
Gentlemen:
I USE THIS FORM TO THANK EACH OF YOU 1 NO IV I DUALLY FOR
YOUR TREMENDOUS CONTRIBUTION TO THE SUCCESS OF THE REGION III
CONFERENCE. MV PERSONAL OBSERVATION* PLUS THE REPORTS I
RECEIVED* IND 8 CATE THAT IT DIO SERVE ITS PURPOSE, 1 AM CERTAIN
THAT THOSE CHARGED WITH PLANNING THE NEXT CONFERENCE WILL WANT
TO MAKE SOME CHANGES* BUT BASICALLY THIS PLAN SERVED US WELL.
It served us well because of the COOPERATION of each of
you. 8ut then NaEB is built on cooperation* thus this was
EXACTLY WHAT WAS ANTICIPATED WHEN IT WAS PLANNEDÂ®
I TRUST NOW THAT EACH OF YOU WILL JOIN ME 8N KEEPING AN
EVER WATCHFUL EYE ON ALL DEVELOPMENTS IN ORDER THAT THE AFFAIRS
of Region III may progress in an orderly manner during the
BALANCE OF THE YEAR.
Thanks again.
Sincerely*
JSM:vml
